name: Audi Q3
description: The price of Audi Q3, a 5 seater SUV, ranges from Rs. 43.81  - 54.65 Lakh. It is available in 4 variants, with an engine of 1984 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. Q3 has an NCAP rating of 5 stars. Audi Q3 is available in 5 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 14.93 kmpl for Q3.
